column1: Interventions should work more specifically and recognize more precisely whether it is really a social interaction or just sitting next to each other. E.g. through microinput.
thinks detection of social interaction could be more efficient if you also use the microphone to determine if a conversation is taking place
thinks if friends/people you're just getting to know didn't phub you or didn't use their smartphone too much, you could definitely get to know each other better
less neutral color of intervention as alternative version
thinks it could be interesting to investigate more stimuli like sound, vibration or sth.else for interventions
would like to be able to set the interventions for being together with selected people
wishes that appservice would restart automatically if phone restarts
thinks the aggresivity and intensity of the interventions should be choose individual by users, because everybody has different usage-habits and preferences
wishes that app could easily be activate if social interaction and turning off if no social interaction
